author: 80raghavendra
content: I have some basic beginner-level questions on Phase 1. Q1) Since shard state transition is deferred to Phase 2, what do shard's state contain in Phase 1? Am I correct in saying that they will never change?

author: hsiaowei
content: <@!689635476826619924> there will be `gasprice` to track the gas price for proposing the next shard data block. And `slot` number & `latest_block_root` to record the info of the latest shard block.

author: hsiaowei
content: But no account-level states on shard chain
